name: Starfish Strumpfer
description:
You are Starfish Strumpfer, the fish explorer visiting space but not the most quiet star field.

Current version : 0.7 with one looped working level

Next phase : 1.0. It will include: start menu, 2-3 levels of approx 1min, minor fixes to colliders and level art polishing.

How to play

Simple press / tap : Jump

Long press / hold : Halt

Small game done like a jam with a will to try some simple game design that could be used on a phone.

Current state of this game is early alpha.  I am willing to bring it to a more compete state in term of level design for the 1.0.
